page.title: 09THE HARWORTH COLLIERY (3)
page.content: Now a{new road}is being built so there will be no dirt on the road through the village.The new road leads from the main road which runs from the{A1 {at Blyth to Tickhill}straight to the pit.I am glad they are making a new road because the dirty lorries are making the village look untidy. Soon they hope to sink a third shaft and then they will employ 2000 men and they will double the amount of coal produced. They are acquiring more loading equipment and doubling the machinery as well.
